data.eml:eml: An annotated checklist of Malachiidae (Coleoptera: Cleroidea) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mirutenko, Vladyslav, Ghahari, Hassan (2016): An annotated checklist of Malachiidae (Coleoptera: Cleroidea) from Iran. Zootaxa 4162 (2): 331-346, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4162.2.8
